70010000039956.intro: Avventurati nella regione di Sinnoh con Pokémon Diamante Lucente e Pokémon Perla Splendente!
70010000039956.description:
Preordine presto disponibile!

Parti per un'avventura attraverso la regione di Sinnoh con Pokémon Diamante Lucente e Pokémon Perla Splendente per Nintendo Switch, in arrivo a fine 2021!

Le avventure di Pokémon Diamante Lucente e Pokémon Perla Splendente sono ambientate nella regione di Sinnoh. Immersa nella natura e sovrastata dall'imponente Monte Corona, Sinnoh è una regione ricca di miti che vengono tramandati di generazione in generazione. Lungo il tuo cammino per diventare il campione della Lega Pokémon visiterai tanti luoghi diversi.


La storia originale è stata fedelmente riprodotta e la scala delle città e dei sentieri è stata preservata. Chi ha giocato a Pokémon Diamante e Pokémon Perla potrà tornare a visitare luoghi familiari e rivivere ancora una volta scene classiche. Chi invece si avventura a Sinnoh per la prima volta troverà tanti nuovi incontri e soprese.

70010000039965.name: Rise Eterna
70010000039965.intro: Scopri la storia di Lua e svela i misteri delle sue origini in questo RPG strategico che ricorda i classici giapponesi dell'era 16-bit.
70010000039965.description:
Fai il pieno di nostalgia con un RPG strategico ispirato ai grandi classici del genere. Parti per un viaggio avventuroso, incontra tanti personaggi originali e immergiti in una narrazione coinvolgente.

Arruola fino a 14 alleati con abilità uniche e sconfiggi il tuo peggior incubo in battaglie spettacolari. Scopri una storia adulta e drammatica, incentrata sulla relazione tra due anime perdute che cercano di scoprire il senso della loro esistenza combattendo fianco a fianco.

CARATTERISTICHE
Raduna il tuo esercito: 14 personaggi e una serie infinita di personalizzazioni possibili. Impara abilità, arruola eroi unici e preparali alla battaglia trasformandoli in macchine da guerra: l'Impero merita la tua furia!

Crea: sviluppa i tuoi personaggi usando gemme create grazie a numerosi ingredienti recuperati in battaglia.

Appassionati a una storia avvincente: vivi e condividi i momenti più importanti delle vite di Lua e Natheal.

Scopri i contenuti segreti: riuscirai a trovare tutte le sfide e i personaggi nascosti? Il gioco è molto più ampio di quel che pensi, perciò esploralo con attenzione e diventa il campione indiscusso di Ars Rare Kingdom.

70010000039989.name: 7 Years From Now
70010000039989.description:
Un gioco di avventura che offre uno spaccato di vita in grafica pixel art 3D - venato di salti nel tempo. Parti per un viaggio in compagnia di Haruto Soraki, un liceale in cerca dei ricordi che avrebbe perso in un incidente di sette anni prima.

Gioca nei panni di Haruto Soraki, un liceale in cerca dei ricordi che avrebbe perso in un incidente di sette anni prima. Il tuo viaggio nella tua città natale ha inizio: incontra amici dimenticati, scopri gli oscuri segreti della città, torna nel passato per battere in astuzia chi vuole fermarti e cerca di rimettere insieme i pezzi di ciò che è accaduto sette anni prima.

CARATTERISTICHE
- Spaccato di vita con una peculiare grafica in pixel
- Gira per la città e interagisci con gli abitanti per avanzare nella storia
- Indaga su eventi misteriosi
- Scopri i segreti della città
- Viaggia nel passato per battere in astuzia i tuoi nemici
- Svela il mistero sulla tua perdita di memori e scopri la verità

70010000039998.name: PROJECT : KNIGHT
70010000039998.intro: In my dreams, I see that island. I'm now there, and there is no turning back. A lonely knight on a deadly island.
70010000039998.description:
PROJECT : KNIGHT is a short, real-time combat Collect-A-Thon with a cartoon-y look. Collect golden coins and battle monsters to progress through 6 unique biomes ( worlds ). Defeating monsters will award you Soul Shards which you can use to upgrade your Knight's power and health.
Start helpless and increase your power!

70010000040003.name: Route Me Mail and Delivery Co
70010000040003.intro: Welcome to your new career! Deliver mail, complete routes and pay off your debt! Become the ultimate postman.
70010000040003.description:
A new delivery company has arrived on the scene!
Route Me Mail and Delivery Co offers only the best in mail and parcel delivery services, 7 days a week!

Complete various routes across multiple cities before your work day ends. Memorize your routes and knock them out in record time to become the best Postman that the company has ever seen.

Upgrade your Postman's abilities and buy decorations for your house at the Route Me Shop. It's also a good idea to pay off your debts!

Collect Hidden Mail and deliver Special Packages to increase your daily payout.

Become the ultimate postman.

70010000040026.name: Classic Checkers
70010000040026.description:
Classic Checkers is an engaging checkers game that helps you enjoy a realistic, fun gameplay of this extraordinary board game. The visuals are extraordinary, and you can also see the current score right away. It’s also possible to rotate the board if you want for the best results and experience.
You can play Classic Checkers against the AI that has multiple difficulties. It’s also possible to play PVP against your friends if you want. Classic Checkers is the ultimate game that you can play if you love board games and want to try out something new, unique and cool. All you have to do is to check it out for yourself and have fun!
Features:
Immersive checkers gameplay
Play PVE or PVP
Stylish visuals
Infinite replay value

70010000040046.name: Ayo the Clown
70010000040046.intro: Andiamo all'avventura per riunire il cane e il pagliaccio!
70010000040046.description:
Nella città natale di Ayo, di solito tutto è molto tranquillo. Accompagnato dal suo talentuoso cane da circo, Bo, Ayo fa il giocoliere nel parco, frequenta il carnevale e desidera follemente la nipote del calzolaio. Fino a quando un giorno Bo scompare!

Giochi nei panni di Ayo, il tuo pagliaccio fuori dagli schemi, alla ricerca del suo migliore amico e amato cane, che è misteriosamente scomparso. Cosa è successo a Bo? Riusciranno mai più ad esplorare insieme il parco? O organizzare quella scena da circo che hanno sempre pianificato? Lo scoprirai durante questa straordinaria avventura mentre proverai a riunire il pagliaccio e il cane. Come tutte le belle avventure, non sarai di certo da solo. Il mondo di Ayo è pieno di persone socievoli e creature interessanti, disposte a darti una mano.

CARATTERISTICHE:
Piattaforme uniche: la parte fondamentale di qualsiasi gioco di piattaforma. Ogni livello ha un tema originale e delle piattaforme interessanti al fine di garantire un gioco divertente e soprattutto non ripetitivo, infatti, Ayo non è il tipo di pagliaccio che fa sempre le stesse battute. Le sue battute migliorano di volta in volta.
Boss giganti e tanti nemici: Sfida boss più grandi della vita stessa e dimostra che i pagliacci sono molto più forti di quanto sembrano. Non lasciarti ingannare dal dolce comportamento di Ayo!
Armi: carri armati, elicotteri, dinosauri, martelli giocattolo, spade a palloncino, palloncini d'acqua, e tanti altri, possono aiutarti a scoprire dei luoghi nascosti, spegnere il fuoco, distruggere i nemici, fare scherzi ai tuoi amici ... ecc.
Abilità: Colpi di testa, salti sul muro, scivoli su pendenze e tanti altri, Ayo ha sicuramente molti assi nella manica.
Missioni secondarie: ci sono molte missioni secondarie che puoi giocare in città o lungo il tuo viaggio, quindi preparati per delle ricompense sorprendenti.
Collezionabili: Riesci trovare e collezionare tutti gli oggetti nascosti durante il gioco? Qualcuno vuole un pollo di gomma e un sacchetto di scoregge?

70010000040066.name: Black Book
70010000040066.intro: Fight evil forces in card-based battles and explore the world, where humans live alongside mythological creatures.
70010000040066.description:
A fusion of card-based RPGs and Adventure games, “Black Book” is a haunting tale of a young sorceress, who gave her life to serve the dark forces. Dive into the cold, yet alluring world of Slavic folktales - and uncover the secrets that hide in the darkness.

A young girl named Vasilisa, destined to become a witch, decides to throw her fate away and marry her beloved - but that dream is shattered when her betrothed dies under mysterious circumstances.

Aching for her lost love, Vasilisa seeks out the Black Book - a demonic artifact said to be powerful enough to grant any wish to the one who uncovers all 7 of its seals. Join Vasilisa in her adventures across the rural countryside, as she solves the woes of the common folk by confronting demons and performing exorcisms.

- Uncover the seals of Black Book
Unleash hellish spells on your enemies! Collect spell cards and new skills as you progress.

- A Historic Adventure
Solve riddles and complete side-quests as you learn more about life in the Slavic countryside.

- Lead a Demonic Flock
Send demons to do your bidding, but be careful - idle demons will torture you if you don’t find them something to do!

- Myths and legends
Explore a world based on Northern Slavic mythology. Learn from an in-game encyclopedia, created with the help of expert anthropologists - and find all folk tales hidden within the game!

70010000040079.name: Tiny Lands
70010000040079.intro: Un rilassante gioco isometrico low poly in cui devi trovare le differenze in 3D e fare esperienza di un bellissimo ambiente.
70010000040079.description:
Cos'è esattamente "Tiny Lands"?
Hai mai giocato ai vecchi rompicapo in cui dovevi trovare tutte le differenze? Be'... Tiny Lands ne estrae il concetto di base ma esce dal metodo tradizionale nel trovare le differenze.
Cosa lo rende differente dai tradizionali giochi "Trova le differenze"?
Di solito questo genere di giochi hanno la tipica visuale 2D in cui devi solo vedere e confrontare immagini statiche e cliccare. Qui è tutto diverso; riassumiamo ciò che rende Tiny Lands così speciale:
Si gioca in un ambiente 3D, il che significa che sarai in grado di interagire con la visuale della scena per trovare tutte le differenze.
Oggetti dinamici, ci sono cose come il fuoco, la pioggia, i tuoni, la neve e il vento che aggiungono una piacevole sensazione al luogo in cui stai giocando.
L'ambiente, se stai giocando in uno scenario di spiaggia sentirai il suono meraviglioso e rilassante delle onde che vanno e vengono... il canto dei gabbiani... Ciò è molto appagante...
Niente tempo, non devi preoccuparti di quanto tempo trascorri su un livello, puoi semplicemente impostare la tua musica lo-fi preferita e giocare a questo gioco al tuo ritmo.
Niente vite, chiunque può sbagliare, no? Allora perché punire le persone per questo, questo è un gioco buono per prendersi una tazza di caffè in una giornata di pioggia e starsene tranquilli.

70010000040082.name: Infernal Radiation
70010000040082.intro: Smash demons and deflect bullets in a hardcore arcade clicker with the RPG elements.
70010000040082.description:
On Halloween Island, engineers test the innovative way of generating heat. The roots of the power plant reach deep into the earth, all the way to the heart of Hell, where the reactors obtain energy from burning souls. When an accident happens, the infernal radiation contaminates the earth. Inhabitants living in defiled areas struggle with numerous possessions. An exorcist is needed.

Game features:
- Very simple gameplay, very difficult opponents.
- Dynamic clashes.
 -20 demons with unique abilities and battle patterns.
- A dark history of the island hidden in the reports of the possessed.
- Help of the rescued residents.
- Free exploration of the rich world.
- A lot of dark humour. 
- The choice of the order of exorcisms.

70010000040120.name: Glitchangels
70010000040120.intro: Distribuisci il tuo team di Glitchangels per riparare "IL SISTEMA", una subroutine corrotta alla volta.
70010000040120.description:
Prova il brivido del caos arcade vecchia scuola, aggiornato e migliorato per i giorni nostri!

Sconfiggi orde di nemici, purifica le aree di corruzione e sblocca abilità devastanti mentre procedi.

Diventa un'apparizione spettrale, diventa supersonico, evoca servitori, bombardare il mondo o persino riavvolgere lo spazio-tempo stesso!

Più sei coraggioso, più vai in profondità, nelle profondità del regno virtuale - a capofitto nel confronto con i cinque capi delle partizioni proibite.

70010000040122.name: Space Commander: War and Trade
70010000040122.intro: Become a space pilot, explore the stars, trade, and lead your fleet across the galaxy in Space Commander: War and Trade!
70010000040122.description:
Dive into the ultimate single-player space sim with multiple career paths, engaging gameplay mechanics, and diversified missions ranging from exciting space battles to an authentic, sandbox RPG experience.

Depending on your preferences, you can choose between building a safe yet pedestrian trader career, the honorable, action-packed role of a space ranger, or the profitable but dangerous life of a mobster. Whatever you choose, make sure to excel, gather reputation points for your actions, and obtain access to the most challenging and best-paid missions.

The more money you earn, the better (and bigger!) space fleet you’ll be able to build, consisting of fast and maneuverable fighters, heavy bombers, and large transporters. All can be built according to your needs and customized to reflect your play style.

Making the right choices will be crucial to ensuring the success of your missions. Aside from choosing the best ship for the job, you need to manage fuel usage, choose the best trading or smuggling routes, and even buy your own space stations that will allow you to explore the furthest corners of the galaxy.

In the end, becoming a true space commander, whether pursuing a legal or not-so-legal career, requires skills, money, and luck. So tell me, rookie, do you have what it takes to achieve ultimate galactic dominance?

BECOME THE BEST SPACE COMMANDER OUT THERE:

• Buy fighters, bombers, and transporters, customize them according to your needs, and build the biggest space fleet around.

• Pursue a mercenary, trader, or mobster career depending on your personal preferences and play style.

• Explore the furthest corners of the galaxy thanks to the in-game expanse module generating countless star systems waiting for your discovery.

• Get involved in a corporate war or fight aliens in multiple, diversified campaign scenarios.

70010000040127.name: Umurangi Generation Special Edition
70010000040127.intro: A first person photography game set during a crisis event
70010000040127.description:
Umurangi Generation is a first person photography game in the retro future. Set in Tauranga Aotearoa off the back of an impending crisis you are a courier for the Tauranga Express. Throughout the game you will unlock a variety of lenses and equipment.

Unique and expressive grading system
Each photo you take is judged on its colour, content and composition. Taking a photo will net you a cash score which will go towards your final payout.

Complete Photo Bounties any way you like. Once you've completed these bounties deliver the parcel to finish the level.

Exploration bonuses on each level
New equipment for your camera is unlocked by finding film canisters, recreating postcards, fulfilling timed deliveries, and finding a way to fit all of your friends in one photo.

Special Edition
Included in the special edition is the DLC Macro, Gyro Controls, Touch Screen Support and Images saving directly to the Switch Gallery. 

Edit your photos and develop your unique colour grade. The tools in the game are flexible enough that you can touch up your photos to look better than when you took them. If you are an experienced photographer you’ll fit right in. If this is your first time, you’ll be on your journey in no time.

What is an 'Umurangi'?
Umurangi is the Te Reo word for Red Sky.

70010000040152.name: Mythic Ocean
70010000040152.intro: Teach the gods to create a better world - or mess it all up!
70010000040152.description:
Freely explore a vibrant ocean. Have relaxing, deep, and amusing conversations with six different gods and a cast of sea creatures. 

The advice you give continuously alters your story and leads to thousands of possible endings, ranging between harmony and pandemonium.

Which god will rise above? What kind of universe will they create? Discover the outcomes of your choices.

“...a world full of life, color, music, and meaning that is sure to stay with you for years to come." - 10/10 GameSpace

“...a lovely, daft, interesting, deep and complex game, with no combat, no death, just choices and consequences." - 8/10 Buried Treasure

“...traversing the ocean depths is serene and relaxing, and encountering the game’s myriad of weird and wonderful creatures is continually delightful." - 8/10 GameSpew

FEATURES
• Narrative Exploration - combines the dialog-focused gameplay of a Visual Novel with free-roaming exploration.
• Through deep conversations with gods, your choices shape the creation of a new world.
• Great replay value - lending different advice can lead to thousands of unique results.
• Diverse, peaceful underwater environments.
• Meet tons of goofy, charming creatures.
• No death, no combat, no failure.
• Both children and adults can relax, have fun and find their own food for thought.
• There's a breakdancing crab.

DEVELOPED BY Paralune
"Our players are storytellers too - we make narratives they can explore and shape, creating an experience unique to them. Mythic Ocean is both a love letter to the beauty and power of the sea, and a game about how you, as a person, have more influence than you realize." - Robyn Haley, Darren Malley and Matt Smudz

PUBLISHED BY Nakana.io
"We publish games that aim to offer a new experience. Diving into Mythic Ocean almost feels like entering a state of meditation where deep thoughts and bonds can be forged.” - Mikaël Bourget, founder of the publishing label

70010000040154.name: Preston Sterling and the Legend of Excalibur
70010000040154.description:
PRESTON STERLING AND THE LEGEND OF EXCALIBUR is an adventure that will transport you into the world of English myths and legends.
Tackle tricky puzzles and enjoy an exciting story, lovable characters and stunning scenes and locations!

AN INNOVATIVE DESIGN
The game's quick-to-learn controls and gradually increasing level of difficulty make the adventure easy to grasp, even for beginners. It also offers dynamic help tools and optional tips to help you to successfully master frustrating stages of the game without missing out on the fun involved in solving the challenging tasks and activities faced by Preston.

AN EXCITING ADVENTURE
Preston Sterling is an adventurer, traveller and treasure-hunter all rolled into one. He's normally never afraid of a challenge, but his new job quickly tests him to his limits. Preston's latest task is to find the most mystical artefact in English mythology: Excalibur, the sword of the legendary King Arthur. Little does he know, however, that the hunt for this fabled treasure will involve far more danger than he could ever have imagined ...

REALISTIC SCENES AND LOCATIONS
Experience an amazingly detailed and lovingly created world of adventure. Every location on Preston's journey has its own special charm that contributes towards your exciting game experience.

70010000040180.name: Colossus Mission
70010000040180.intro: Discover secrets of the odd spaceship, who unexpectedly entered Earth orbit.
70010000040180.description:
When a huge alien spacecraft enters low Earth orbit many nations send their teams to investigate it. Your crew is the only one who managed to get inside the colossal vessel. Now the exploration and research rests on your shoulders.
Defeat levels to learn more about the spaceship and it’s members. Your piloting skills will be tested as this is not a friendly environment to stay. Even considering all the help you get from an unknown entity.
Main features:
- 73 different levels with various dangers
- Challenging entertainment for many hours
- Set in space!
- Some levels are really hard!

70010000040184.name: Super Disc Soccer
70010000040184.intro: A turn-based tactical soccer like game where you need to find the perfect angle or use a series of ricochets to score a goal and win the game !
70010000040184.description:
Super Disc Soccer is a tactical, turn-based soccer like game that can be played single player or by two players. Players can select and drag on their units to adjust the power and direction of the shoot. The ball physics allows you to find the perfect angle or use a genius ricochet to score a goal !  Select between different defensive and offensive formations to adjust your tactics and strategy during play. The game also features "Tournament" and "Penalty Kicks" modes where you can test your abilities.

Features :
- Arcade and Tournament Mode
- One or Two player mode
- Simple, but highly addictive physics based game-play
- Realistic soccer ball physics for a thrilling and rational game-play

70010000040273.name: Sweets Swap
70010000040273.intro: Swap the sweets to match three of the same kind and advance to the next level. Simple enough but not always easy! Play now!
70010000040273.description:
Sweets Swap is a classic three match game where you need to match three of the same kind to advance to the next level. Simple enough and flavoured with sweet variations to keep you on your toes! 

Features:
- Simple three match game
- Many variations and different objectives to reach
- Colourful and sweet art style
- 100 Levels to complete

70010000040280.name: Go! Birdie
70010000040280.intro: Go! Birdie is fast pace action game, where player has to collect all the fruits in maze-like maps while avoiding enemies. Play solo or in local co-op with your friend.
70010000040280.description:
Being a little nestling, Birdie listened to the story about a Golden Grain many times. Growing up he dreamed of finding the treasure, however, he didn’t have enough strength and determination. Now, when he is grown up, he decided to fulfill his childhood dream and find this artifact.

Join our hero, to experience a wonderfull adventure in various and colorful locations. Starting in a modest forest, throughout rich castles, down to the secrets of the deep sea. Help Birdie defeat the threats he might encounter, and with help of other travelers lead him to the Golden Grain.

In "Go! Birdie", you have to collect all fruits present in grid-based, maze-like levels. Other animals will try to stop you, so avoid conflicts or pick up right power-ups to fight back. There are also bonus levels, where time is your only enemy. You can either maximize your score by beating whole game at once, or play it cool from chapter to chapter.

70010000040292.name: Plastic Rebellion
70010000040292.intro: Change your playground into a battlefield. Square off against an out-of-control 3D Printer with an army of your old-school toys, and stop the Plastic Rebellion!
70010000040292.description:
When the parents are out, the whole house becomes a playground. But when a malfunction infects your 3D printer and starts mischief, it’s up to you to defend the place you call home and turn your playground into a battlefield! Armed only with your cherished toys, you must face an ever-growing army of plastic and stop the malfunction before it takes over the world (or at least your bedroom, kitchen and basement)!

Experience a unique twist on the tower defence genre – work out the best strategy and place your defensive troops in levels full of interactive elements, then support them with a set of specialized weapons. Face off against enemies both on the ground and in the air through a series of ever more intense waves, culminating in a standoff with a giant boss.

Main Features:
- Tower defence gameplay with FPS elements
- Diverse choice of defensive troops
- Fully interactive environments
- Bright, cartoon graphics

70010000040294.name: Cross the Moon
70010000040294.intro: Quando guardi in alto, la luna ricambia lo sguardo.
70010000040294.description:
Qualcosa un tempo maestoso riposa dormiente sotto le fredde strade dell’isolata capitale di Armorica, L’Amour.

Quando dorme sogna, e quando sogna va a caccia. I destini convergono quando la misteriosa morte di un giovane porta i fratelli vampiro Aurore e Lux Amanite in un mondo di ossessioni occulte e corruzione aziendale.

Nel frattempo, l’ispettrice di polizia Ryouko Otsuki arriva a L’Amour e trova una città dall’identità tanto frammentata e rotta quanto la sua…

Caratteristiche
- Una visual novel lineare raccontata attraverso gli occhi di tre protagonisti
- Circa 100.000 parole (durata orientativa 6-10 ore)
- Un grande cast di 24 personaggi illustrati
- Più di 1000 fotografie fanno prendere vita alla storia
- Ore di colonna sonora originale

70010000040299.name: Motif
70010000040299.intro: Motif is a minimalistic puzzle game that brings artistic elements to the foreground.
70010000040299.description:
The aim of the puzzle is to create the desired motif using the pieces that are given to you. In doing so, you need to pay attention to how many pieces the play area is divided into. The parts have symmetry equal to the number of areas on the screen. For this reason, you have to carefully choose where you need to put the pieces.

Motif makes you part of an artistic journey. Thanks to its relaxed atmosphere, it makes you aware of your artistic talents.

Features:
• 200+ carefully crafted motif levels
• Beautifully designed minimal puzzle game
• Support for both touch and gamepad
• Exclusive for sharpest mind and artistic souls.

70010000040305.name: IdolDays
70010000040305.intro:
Can a delinquent girl transform into an idol?! 
An idol and a rookie producer's heart-pounding new roommate life begins!
70010000040305.description:
A love-adventure game where you can enjoy the heart-pounding roommate life of a rookie producer and a delinquent girl turned idol.

<STORY>
A young man working at an Akihabara-based agency that manages underground idol groups has been ordered to discover new idols by his boss. Now, he's at the end of his rope.

The protagonist is at a loss, finding that girls with the talent to become the kind of idol he's picturing are few and far between. He's sitting defeated on a park bench when he comes across a girl singing to herself while feeding some cats.

The girl's song is delicate, but her voice shakes him to the core. His heart stolen in an instant, the protagonist turns to the girl and tries to scout her to become an idol. However, the girl flatly refuses him, saying the idea is stupid, only to then disappear.

The next day, the protagonist gets called into the office, where he learns that the daughter of their sponsor has been hired as a member of staff and gets assigned to be her training supervisor. The girl who appears before the bewildered young man is the same one who turned down his scouting offer the day before.

The girl's name is Tsubaki Akanesaki. Though she's had several jobs, she got fired from all of them for getting into fights. What does fate have in store for a young man who's been assigned to train a girl whose a total delinquent?!

<STAFF>
Illustration:Atsuto Shinozuka
Scenario:Linkedbrain Inc.
Producer/Planner :Yujiro Usuda

70010000040311.name: Metal Unit
70010000040311.description: Metal Unit is a sprawling side-scrolling platformer with roguelite features. Play as Joanna, a soldier on a mission to capture her treasonous sister. Wear the M-Unit 11 suit and battle against monsters and aliens while uncovering the truth about humanity.

70010000040316.name: Tiger Trio's Tasty Travels
70010000040316.description: Risolvi i puzzle con un simpatico gruppo di animali che servono sushi! Unisciti ai nostri tre fratelli tigrotti mentre vanno per il mondo con il loro camion di sushi. È super delizioso, ma gli ordini tendono sempre a confondersi. Con l'aiuto dei loro talentuosi amici, risolvi i puzzle aggiungendo, togliendo e spostando il sushi tra i nastri trasportatori, fissando gli ordini prima che raggiungano il cliente! Incontrerai luoghi come la terra dei fantasmi e ti avventurerai anche nello spazio! Questo nuovo gioco rompicapo metterà alla prova il tuo ingegno in un totale di 60 livelli. Include una funzione suggerimento, per cui i giocatori di qualsiasi età possono viaggiare con il Trio di Tigrotti e i loro amici. Durante il viaggio potresti persino ritrovarti a dover pensare come un  programmatore!

70010000040343.name: Pixel Game Maker Series ISEKAI QUARTET Adventure:Action Game
70010000040343.intro:
A great adventure in a mysterious world!
Lead 5 characters to victory!
Pain and pleasure abound in this jumping action game!
70010000040343.description:
Take control of Albedo, Megumin, Emilia, Tanya, and Raftaria, and conquer all 18 stages!
The first Isekai Quartet action game for Nintendo Switch™!

[Story]
One day, a "button" suddenly appeared in the classroom.
Pressing the button transports you to a mysterious world.
Will everyone be able to return to the school safely?

【Game Content】
●Adventure in an amazing and mysterious world!
A total of 18 stages in 6 areas with a variety of tricks!
There's something awfully familiar about those enemies...
Dodge & Defeat your foes on your way to clearing the stage!

●Familiar Characters
Albedo, Megumin, Emilia, Tanya, and Raftaria are all playable characters.
Each has a different jumping power and attack method.
In addition to direct attacks, you can even grab enemies and throw them
Find a favorite character that fits your play style!

●Support Skills!
Collect items to use support skills!
Ainz, Kazuma, Rem, Veesha, and Naofumi will lend their abilities to help the player.

●Find the hidden items!
Complete the "Isekai Quartet" Gallery!
In each stage, there are hidden items that can be viewed in the "Gallery" once collected.
Will you be able to find all the items?

"Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series where you can enjoy games created using the action game production software " Pixel Game Maker MV"(Not available on Nintendo Switch™) on Nintendo Switch™.

70010000040360.name: LEGO® Builder's Journey
70010000040360.intro: LEGO Builder’s Journey è un puzzle game geometrico e suggestivo, che a volte ci chiede di seguire le istruzioni, mentre altre volte... di infrangere le regole.
70010000040360.description:
Una storia di gioco, connessioni e avventura.

Percorri i livelli mattoncino dopo mattoncino e risolvi gli enigmi. Segui le istruzioni, oppure scatena la tua creatività per rompere ogni regola!

Builder’s Journey è un puzzle poetico che si svolge in un mondo di LEGO®, animato da elementi riprodotti con una precisione mai vista sugli schermi. Lasciati trasportare in un mondo mozzafiato, pieno di mattoncini ed effetti, e accompagnato da una splendida colonna sonora.

Nel corso della storia vivrai vittorie e sconfitte, sfide e celebrazioni. Prenditi il tempo necessario per sperimentare e, soprattutto, per capire chi siamo e ciò che diventiamo. Questo è Builder’s Journey.

70010000040389.name: Family Mysteries 3: Criminal Mindset
70010000040389.description:
Vesti i panni di una famosa scienziata coinvolta in un gioco pericoloso in cui l’obiettivo è salvare l’intera umanità e scoprire il segreto di famiglia. Preparati per un’avventura ricca di adrenalina in un mondo di esperimenti, misteri e spionaggi!

Tu sei Nancy Bradford, la figlia dal grande talento di un famoso scienziato morto 20 anni fa in circostanze poco chiare. A conoscenza dei tuoi progressi nel campo del controllo mentale, sia il Neurotech Institute che la CIA decidono di farti un’offerta alquanto insolita: proseguire i tuoi studi tra le mura di un laboratorio top-secret con ogni tipo di sicurezza, ma alla condizione di spiare che, d’altro canto, potrebbe risultare molto pericoloso. E questo non è altro che l’inizio di un gioco letale!

Il terzo episodio della serie Family Mysteries ti proietta in un mondo ricco di azione, doppiogiochisti, pazienti indottrinati, torbidi esperimenti, cervelloni fanatici e teorie complottiste. Un entusiasmante esempio di fantaspionaggio con un principio di X-Files in grado di soddisfare anche i fan più esigenti del genere, con una storia che si sviluppa a un ritmo elevatissimo e coinvolge fino all’ultimo istante!

Cerca di non farti scoprire, salva l’umanità intera e scopri il vecchio segreto di famiglia così da fare un po’ di luce sul passato!

70010000040408.name: Green Phoenix
70010000040408.intro: Where 3D Space shooter meets deep narrative experience
70010000040408.description:
Green Phoenix is an on-rails 3D space shooter mixed with a deep narrative experience that focuses on the concept of ego and the meaning of freedom. 
 
In Green Phoenix, we are transported to a single player story where society is fully technologized and authoritarian and take us on the role of the spaceship AI, Green Phoenix, as it remembers its dead pilot, Dana, and embarks on a journey of revenge. 

Features 
Deep and inmersive storytelling 
Beautifully sculpted worlds 
Fully voiced 
Arcade mode, how long will you survive?

70010000040426.name: Pony World 3
70010000040426.intro: In Pony World 3 you can create your own dream pony from scratch and help develop his character by choosing way of education, career and make a lot of friends.
70010000040426.description:
Change your pony's looks and clothing, add glasses and saddles or even tattoos.

Make your pony’s farm his dream place to live. Build it and expand it to look best in the neighborhood. Decorate it and plant new plants to acquire higher status. Sell products from your farm to earn money for food, gifts and toys. Improved building mode with lots of new buildings and decorations will make your farm unique.

Pony Town has all facilities needed by your pony to spend playful time, develop its career and education and care for its looks and health. Visit stylists and beauty salons to become the most pretty and stylish pony. Attend school and university to find better paid job. And there's a lot of places you can go after (or instead of) work: theatre, disco, cinema, skate park, circus and more. And if that's not enough you can always go to the beach or take a trip around the forest or in the mountains.

Game features:

- improved 3D graphics with free look mode.
- five huge locations with plenty of places to go plus three additional locations to build your dream farm.
- improved gameplay and interface for even easier navigation
- five scenarios to play and a free play mode where only your imagination is the limit.
- 5 new mini-game competitions
- hundreds of farm decorations and buildings

70010000040452.name: Connection reHaunted
70010000040452.description:
Ciao,

Mi auguro che vada tutto bene. Ho ricevuto il CD che mi avevi mandato e, dopo aver dato un’occhiata rapida ai file, posso rassicurarti che ci sono discrete probabilità che il software sia recuperabile. Sembra che alcuni dati siano corrotti, ma ci sono buone chance che possa essere comunque avviato.

Ovviamente non ho indagato a fondo, ma sembrerebbe essere un videogioco di quelli elementari. Ho notato parecchi file rinominati “map”, quindi mi viene da pensare che ci siano più livelli. Per cui direi che ci sono anche delle armi di qualche tipo. Ha senso, no? Penso proprio che si tratti di uno di quegli sparatutto stile retrò.

Comunque sia, ho davvero bisogno di riposarmi, non ho dormito molto l’altra notte. Ho fatto un mucchio di incubi, uno più confuso dell’altro, e non ricordo nemmeno bene su cosa. Ti terrò aggiornato su come procede.

Saluti,
David

70010000040457.name: Nyakamon Adventures
70010000040457.intro: Help NyaKaMon to get through challenging levels of sokoban!
70010000040457.description:
- 30 levels of normal mode + 30 levels of hadrcore mode
- Match the runes in the normal mode
- 2 biomes - light and dark
- Cute graphics
- Relaxing music

70010000040465.name: Spirits of Xanadu
70010000040465.description:
At the farthest edge of the explored universe, the research ship Xanadu slumbers in orbit around a mysterious planet. Her systems remain active but there has been no message from her crew for months. Now a lone operative has been sent to wake the Xanadu and bring her home to Earth.

Spirits of Xanadu is an atmospheric exploration game set aboard a deserted starship in an alternate 1980s. It draws inspiration from classic sci-fi films, novels, and games to create an immersive and highly interactive environment, featuring puzzles and FPS elements in the service of a unique and layered plot.

70010000040466.name: Save me Mr Tako: Definitive Edition
70010000040466.description:
Dive into a great adventure in the classic handheld era!

In a world where humans and octopuses are at war, Tako is a pacifist little octopus who rescues a woman from drowning one stormy night. A fairy sees this act of bravery and grants him the ability to survive on land. As he travels across the world, Tako defies his family and his people to try to resolve conflicts between humans and octopuses, plunging him into the very roots of this dysfunctional world.

Tako will solve puzzles, turn enemies into platforms by spitting ink at them, explore mysterious dungeons and fight tenacious bosses on his mission to end the war between the undersea Octopus kingdom and the terrestrial Human realm. Will you help this brave octopus to spread his message of tolerance and teach both species to coexist in peace and unity?

Features
- 6 worlds and more than 50 levels to explore
- 50 different hats that Tako can wear to gain special abilities
- Extensive character dialogue with many unique and memorable NPCs
- Side quests, puzzles, mini-games and 16 different dungeons to explore
- Multiple selectable palettes to change the game’s color scheme

Definitive Edition features:

-New difficulty modes and rebalancing of the original game
-Hint System, Auto palette option and more quality of life improvements
-Sound system to listen to the soundtrack composed by Marc-Antoine Archier
-New border images and additional content

70010000040468.name: Jin Conception
70010000040468.intro: Jin Conception è un JRPG a turni che mescola le meccaniche di un social deduction game ad atmosfere fantasy/thriller.
70010000040468.description:
Le storie di otto personaggi, ciascuno giocabile, si intrecciano quando tre di essi accedono al Final Layer: due scompaiono senza lasciare traccia e solo uno di loro riesce a tornare indietro, sostenendo di non ricordare nulla di quanto accaduto. Di chi ti puoi fidare? Chi sta dicendo la verità e chi sta mentendo? Chi è tuo alleato e chi è tuo nemico?

Caratteristiche principali:
Combattimento strategico a turni basato sull’equilibro.
Continuità fra le fasi di esplorazione e le fasi di combattimento: nessun cambio di schermata quando si ingaggia uno scontro.
Sistema di potenziamenti e alterazioni di stato. Per esempio, i personaggi non possono fuggire da un combattimento se sono afflitti dall’alterazione di stato Stuck.
Presenza di Tecniche Jin doppie e triple, che permettono ai membri del gruppo di combinare le proprie tecniche per sprigionare attacchi ancora più potenti.
Possibilità di piazzare trappole per fini strategici, come causare il ritardo di un attacco durante il combattimento.
Finali multipli.
Il nemico può cambiare in base alle scelte del giocatore.

Jin Conception è un gioco single-player in cui il giocatore deve capire chi può essere suo alleato e chi suo nemico.

70010000040496.name: Arcane Arts Academy
70010000040496.intro: Erika has always felt different. Somehow, she just never seemed to fit in. To her the world always seemed to have some hidden meaning she could never quite grasp… until
70010000040496.description:
Welcome to the Arcane Arts Academy, home to a magical menagerie of wonders! Join Erika as she adjusts to her new life and takes on the unique struggles and challenges of everyday life as a magical college student. She’ll make new friends, and maybe even find love… but she may also find unexpected foes! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, seeking to control Erika’s magical abilities. Perhaps not all is as it seems after all!

Features: 
- Join Erika and find out who—or what—is lurking in the shadows!
- Experience a Time Management game in an unforgettable magical setting.
- Enjoy gorgeous artistically-rendered environments perfectly suited for mobile devices.
- Play 60 engaging levels offering hours of unique gameplay.
- Watch 120 beautiful story-driven cutscenes (including a unique intro and outro for every level).
- Spend diamonds to decorate Erika’s dorm room.
- Immerse yourself in the magic with an enchanting atmospheric soundtrack.

In Arcane Arts Academy, you will be tasked with helping Erika in her various magic classes. Grab items and combine ingredients into wonderful new creations and spells. But be warned—everyone has limited patience, including teachers and students! Manage your time and actions well to earn rewards. Perform well to receive stars from your classmates and diamonds to decorate your dorm room.

70010000040503.name: Overboard!
70010000040503.intro: GET AWAY WITH MURDER. Highly replayable detective game where you're the one whodunnit. From the creators of 80 Days and Heaven's Vault.
70010000040503.description:
JULY, 1935. A MURDER HAS BEEN COMMITTED aboard the SS Hook, eight hours out from New York.

Only one problem: you did it.

Can you get away with murder?

GAMEPLAY

Blackmail a spy. Fall in love. Murder a rival. Cheat at cards. Drug a witness. Lie, befriend, betray, console, sneak, seduce, steal, borrow, pray, eavesdrop, kill...

There are clues, evidence, suspects, accusations, secrets and lies.

You’ll need all your cunning, coercion and charisma to ensure that someone else takes the fall.

DYNAMIC NARRATIVE CLOCKWORK

* Next-gen visual novel: go where you want, when you want, and say what you want
* Simulated story-world: other characters move and act independently, remember everything they see and hear, and everything you do
* Every minute counts: you have eight hours to escape justice. Time is always ticking!
* Who can you trust? Some characters are friendly, and some are out to get you. Who will you befriend? Who will you betray?

Built using the award-winning ink narrative engine, Overboard!'s narrative twists itself around every choice you make.

Play once for a thrill, or multiple times to uncover all the secrets and achieve an ideal ending.

HIGHLY REPLAYABLE

One play-through lasts about 30 - 45 minutes, but achieving the perfect crime run will take a lot longer...

CAN YOU GET AWAY WITH MURDER?

70010000040505.name: Space Warrior
70010000040505.intro: Un fantastico sparatutto a scorrimento arcade con una grafica incredibile!
70010000040505.description:
Visita questo futuro alternativo in cui la Terra è rimasta coinvolta in una incredibile saga spaziale. Sembra non esserci più nulla da scoprire nel sistema solare, ma nei punti più lontani dell'universo l'umanità si è scontrata con una resistenza crudele. Sei l'unica persona in grado di salvare la galassia dagli alieni invasori!
Scegli Railgun, Blaster o Laser e affronta orde di nemici alieni. Fluttuate come una farfalla e pisciate come un'ape nel vero combattimento 3D. Ottieni il denaro e pompa le tue navi e completa tutti i livelli della campagna.
CARATTERISTICHE:
- ambientazione spaziale popolare
- nemici e boss futuristici
- mondo 3D mozzafiato
- tonnellate di splendidi colpi, esplosioni ed effetti
- arcade vecchia scuola bulletstorm
- molto facile da giocare, divertiti

Ti piace lo spazio, le sparatorie e i vecchi arcade - questo gioco è per te!

70010000040532.name: Arcade Archives SEICROSS
70010000040532.intro:
Sneak into the mysterious fortress, 
evade pursuit and launch an attack!
70010000040532.description:
"SEICROSS" is a shooting game released by Nichibutsu in 1984.
Taking place in an interstellar city, drive your bike, GILGIT, and rescue Petrimen while avoiding attacks.
Enemy bikes can be defeated by bodily hitting them to knock them over or into walls and other objects on the terrain. Use these tactics in combination with beams to fight.

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

*The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.

70010000040537.name: Arcade Archives DARWIN 4078
70010000040537.intro:
Chaos is calling...
from the world of mutation!
70010000040537.description:
"DARWIN 4078" is a shooting game released by Data East in 1986. 
Your ship evolves by absorbing life forms that it converts into energy, and changes shape as well as evolving new attacks and characteristics. 
There are also mutations that do not follow the evolutionary path, and you can end up with unique ships you never would have imagined!

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

*The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.

70010000040551.name: Arcade Archives HACHA MECHA FIGHTER
70010000040551.intro:
Cute characters and fun music! 
A user-friendly design that's great for all players!
70010000040551.description:
"HACHA MECHA FIGHTER" is a shooting game released by NMK in 1991.
Control KAWAUSO and TSUCHIBUTA as they fly forward on airplanes and defeat enemies along the way.
It's a great, easy game to get into, even for players who don't often play shooting games, but still poses enough of a challenge to keep fans of the genre interested!

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

*The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.

70010000040554.name: Metro Simulator
70010000040554.intro: Metro Simulator: simulatore realistico di metropolitana
70010000040554.description:
Attenzione prego, treno in arrivo sul binario 1! Vesti i panni di uno degli operatori su cui, ogni giorno, fanno affidamento migliaia di persone che vanno al lavoro o tornano a casa. Cogli l'occasione unica di vivere la metropolitana di Mosca in maniera inedita! Controlla il treno come nella vita reale: accelera, frena, apri le porte, passa da una telecamera all'altra, imposta le funzioni della locomotiva e molto altro ancora! Poi diventa un passeggero e vai a visitare le stazioni, i treni e il deposito. Sarai all'altezza della sfida? Riuscirai a prendere il controllo delle profondità della metropoli? I passeggeri si fidano di te, portali a destinazione in sicurezza e in orario!

Funzionalità: 
• Esperienza di guida realistica: stai alla guida del treno come nella vita reale. Le stazioni e le gallerie sono state ricreate tenendo conto dei percorsi, dei dislivelli e delle curve. 
• Sistema interattivo dei semafori: pianifica il percorso e giungi a destinazione in tempo.
• Sistema intelligente del flusso dei passeggeri: i passeggeri reagiscono ai treni in arrivo, salgono a bordo, trovano posto e si preparano a salire e a scendere.
• Parti della giornata: grande stress durante il giorno e una situazione più calma di notte! La fretta dei passeggeri dipende dal momento della giornata.
• Le stazioni più belle al mondo: stanno solo aspettando te! 
• Una routine quotidiana sempre diversa: svolgi una serie di incarichi in tanti luoghi diversi, segui le istruzioni del capostazione e reagisci agli eventi, ad esempio ai passeggeri che cadono sui binari. 
• Modalità di gioco libera: scegli il tuo percorso e decidi la stazione di partenza, l'orario e la tabella di marcia.

70010000040556.name: Driving World: Aspen
70010000040556.description:
Driving World: Aspen opens to you an authentic-looking, challenging location to drive around and prove your driving skills in. Start exploring it in your trusty SUV, getting the hang of navigating around the narrow, windy mountain roads. After a bit of practice you’ll be able to advance and try your luck in more demanding vehicles.

Visit the great, majestic winter resort, driving on ice-covered roads in a variety of exciting, challenging vehicles! Plow through snow, drift in a rally car, feel the winter air in a snowmobile or try to navigate a big, bulky bus! Plentiful exciting challenges await you!

FEATURES:
PICTURESQUE WINTER LOCALE: Explore the inviting, beautiful resort
DAY AND NIGHT CYCLE: Notice how the environment changes with the time of the day
10 COOL VEHICLES TO DRIVE: From a small snowmobile to a giant bus with everything in between!
REALISTIC GRAPHICS & EFFECTS: Winter driving has never felt so authentic
5 AWESOME BONUS VEHICLES TO DRIVE IN FREE ROAM!: Try out sports cars, truck and the old classic!

In the course of the game you’ll get the chance to try out and drive a myriad of exciting cars. From big to small, in all shapes, sizes and utilities. Each one will pose a different challenge and ask you to learn new skills. A rally car is fast and easy to handle, so you’ll be able to drive fast and drift to cut corners and get to your destination on time. Then to drive a large van or even a bus you will have to teach yourself to be more careful and mindful of your surroundings.

In free-roaming mode you can explore the game world at your own pace! Complete new missions each day to earn in-game rewards! Challenges include: perform amazing jumps, stay in the air as long as possible, find a reward hidden on the map and more!

Feel like a tourist and explore this exciting, wondrous winter land at your own pace or put the pedal to the metal and do what you can to beat the record and get the gold trophy for your performance! Whatever your approach, this time spent in the cold will be something to remember!

70010000040581.name: Revolver and Co
70010000040581.intro: Take control of a revolver that asks trivia questions, and discharges its own ammo the more wrong your answers are!
70010000040581.description:
It's 2038, and a late maniacal inventor has left behind a legacy of madness - coordinates to an island full of wealthy robots, a gun that asks questions, and a widow that's hired you to answer them.

As Izzy Buspec, the newest recruit to Randco, take charge of their patented revolver as you explore the densely packed biomes of Corvynnia, bringing down hordes of docile robots in a money-making adventure. Every time you fire, you'll have to answer one of over 2,000 trivia questions with answers based on numbers, percentages, geography, dates, and more - the further you are from the actual answer, the more of its own ammunition the revolver will discharge. If you run out, it's back to Randco HQ to reload!

Revolver and Co features 105 story levels across 7 unique worlds and 12 question themes which will test you on a wide range of subjects, tied together with humorous debriefings between Izzy and her maniacal boss before the start of each mission.

Or if you're looking for more of a challenge, have a go at one of the Endless challenges, which pits you against a barrage of questions until you finally succumb to an empty revolver chamber. You can even unlock more Endless challenges by completing the story levels, including a grueling hour-long session where the only thing you have to lose is time.

70010000040597.name: Paradox Error
70010000040597.intro: Adattati e supera i glitch in un mondo digitale in continua evoluzione!
70010000040597.description:
Paradox Error è un'interpretazione surreale del formato platform a scorrimento che combina uno stile minimalista in bianco e nero con una progettazione auto-consapevole che rompe la quarta parete. I glitch sono integrati intenzionalmente e permettono al giocatore di sfuggire alla morte, aprire nuove zone attivando bug o lanciarsi da elementi di interfaccia come se fossero parte dell'ambientazione. Il menu principale della schermata iniziale funziona come centro di rigenerazione, i cursori possono essere nemici o guide utili, gli errori grafici nascondono parti dello schermo e il personaggio del giocatore esplode in pixel alla morte.

Per sopravvivere, dovrai identificare rapidamente quali porzioni di schermo puoi raggiungere, quali pixel puoi toccare e quali sono semplicemente uno sfondo grafico. Adattati a una meccanica di gioco che cambia prospettiva o che richiede di interagire con un glitch. Fondamentalmente, Paradox Error è un rompicapo ambientale in continua evoluzione in cui morire ripetutamente ti aiuterà a fare ulteriori tentativi più consapevoli, fino a quando l'obiettivo sarà a portata di mano. Decisamente difficile, ma abbastanza onesto da incoraggiarti a continuare a giocare, questo gioco è un esercizio per tentativi, in cui la determinazione diventa la vera ricompensa.

Caratteristiche:

• Esplora un mondo digitale imprevedibile e pieno di glitch!
• Adattati a meccaniche di gioco e prospettive sempre mutevoli.
• Prova, muori e ripeti per imparare come sopravvivere.
• Goditi una grafica pixel art minimalista in bianco e nero.
• Usa gli elementi di interfaccia e i bug di gioco a tuo vantaggio!

70010000040632.name: Shieldwall Chronicles: Swords of the North
70010000040632.intro: Shieldwall Chronicles: Swords of the North is a gripping, tactical RPG that lets you build a powerful band of adventurers and partake in a grand adventure.
70010000040632.description:
In Shieldwall Chronicles: Swords of the North, you lead a mercenary band into the perilous and cold northlands of Tarren. Your search for fortune will see you pitch blade and spell book against a host of enemies including the undead, demons, and lizardmen and many other creatures. In a battle that is part game-book and part tactical RPG, you will build a powerful band of warriors and wizards and tilt the balance of power in the northern kingdoms.

Key features:
- Take part in deep, turn-based combat.
- Build a party from among 15 different classes.
- A unique morale system adds an entirely new tactical layer to the combat.
- Collect hundreds of powerful magic items to equip your party.
- Enjoy over 50 hours of gameplay in the campaign.
- Delve into a gritty, realistic world that blends dark age history and culture with fantasy races and monsters.

70010000040636.name: Luciform
70010000040636.intro: Luciform is a precision platformer that demands quick reflexes and nerves of steel. Can you help “Luci” navigate a dangerous forest to save its people from the nasty Red-Eyed Gorilla?
70010000040636.description:
What is Luciform?
Luciform is a 2D color-based precision platformer.
This basically means that in this game you can ONLY interact with the same colored platform as yours and that you will fail MANY times trying to beat the next level.
Traverse the world while avoiding hazards and deadly falls, Timing jumps with the utmost precision is a must!

This game offers you:
-Color-based gameplay that will challenge any player
-Tons of levels to explore, die, and beat
-Epic fight vs the Red-Eyed Gorila (He kidnapped Luci's family)
-Two gameplay options, for the casual and the hardcore gamers.
-Endless & random level to test your skills
-Four colorblind options

70010000040645.name: 世界の中心で、AIは戦う
70010000040645.intro:
Programming learned from games.
Sequential, branch, repeat. New type of programming puzzle where you can experience basics of programming.
70010000040645.description:
The player programs the robot and repels oncoming monsters.

For programming, just place blocks without using a general programming language so that elementary school students can play.

However, by considering the weapons and logic to equip according to the type, number and position of the monsters who came,
You can train your thinking like a game.

◆staff
○Robot Design
eldenka

○Cyborg Design
ANIKI

○ GUI / Background Design
ZOO

○ Special Thanks
Yosuke Fujikawa
Yuji Mori
Midori(Kuruma)
toku

70010000040652.name: Wicce
70010000040652.intro: Entra nella città della morte per salvare la cara figlia!
70010000040652.description:
Una strega di nome Wicce viveva con sua figlia in una casa nella fitta foresta.

Un giorno, sua figlia andò a fare una commissione, ma non tornò nemmeno dopo il tramonto del sole all'orizzonte.
Wicce andò in città a cercare sua figlia.

Ma non si aspettava di vedere che la città era piena di persone colpite dalla pandemia e demoni che emettevano un'aura disgustosa.
Quindi Wicce decide di combattere i demoni e curare le persone con la sua magia.

Ma il Papa, avendo sentito parlare delle sue azioni, ritiene che Wicce abbia causato la pandemia...

• Scorri, vola, colpisci e usa la magia con la scopa di Wicce!
• Salva le persone cadute e supera i boschi pericolosi pieni di trappole!
• Sconfiggi i boss in battaglie dinamiche! Supera i loro disegni spietati e colpisci i punti deboli!
• Esplora livelli e scopri scrigni del tesoro contenenti oggetti speciali!

La città e il bosco sono stati colpiti da un'epidemia, piena di trappole e demoni.
Può Wicce eludere il Pape e salvare sua figlia?
Inizia il viaggio per salvare la cara ragazza!

70010000040657.name: KASIORI
70010000040657.description:
Girls battle with sweets falling block puzzle!
With Single play, 1P versus &2P versus mode.

3 sweets which are same and connected will disappear.
And sweet in bottle be broke by other bottle fell on it.

It is also for beginner to lightly enjoy the puzzle combo.

Total of 8 character appear.

70010000040674.name: VasterClaws 3:Dragon slayer of the God world
70010000040674.intro: Defeat the God-devouring Dragon in this deceptively simple squad building game!
70010000040674.description:
The gameplay focuses on raising your soldiers' levels, strengthening their weapons, and balancing their unique traits and skills to create the strongest squad possible. 
Lead your ultimate squad deeper into the realm of evil, or try it skills online against other players' squads and move your way up the online ranks.

[Story]
Two beings of the 《human world》 hold holy power:
《Shrine Maiden》holds “The Holy Power of Transition",
《Dragon Slayer》 holds “The Holy Power of Dragonslaying”.
These two souls resonate, and the soldiers of the 《human world》 assemble to
face the 《evil dragons of the God World》.

You must become the 《dragon slayer》 or 《shrine maiden》to defeat 《Lord Vaster Dragon》 and his monsters to free the 《God World》 from his terrible power.
Enter the belly of 《the dragon》 and release the 《spirit hoard》 of Gods and men that are trapped within.

70010000040681.name: Super Soccer Blast: America VS Europe
70010000040681.intro: Preparati per il calcio d'inizio con un gioco di calcio dal ritmo serrato
70010000040681.description:
Super Soccer Blast America vs Europe è un gioco del calcio in stile arcade che affronta il calcio in modo leggero e accessibile. Come una fuga dalla serietà della simulazione e del realismo, porta in campo uno stile molto arcade con richiami retrò.

Preparati per il calcio d'inizio con un gioco di calcio dal ritmo serrato, che porta un aspetto nuovo al genere calcistico offrendo controlli accessibili e un gameplay basato sull'abilità come i classici giochi di calcio più blasonati.

⚽ CREA IL TUO DREAM ELEVEN
Crea i tuoi personaggi dalla testa ai piedi o modifica i giocatori e le squadre come impostazione predefinita e crea la tua squadra dei sogni per vincere i tornei nella modalità World Tour come la Copacup o l'Euronations.

⚽ CONTRO 4 GIOCATORI
Nel gioco esci dai tuoi panni e decidi chi è la leggenda del calcio tra i tuoi amici con l'offline contro un massimo di 4 giocatori!

⚽ GAMEPLAY VELOCE
Controlli accessibili per tutti i tipi di giocatori, a prescindere dalla loro modalità di gioco, consentendo tiri, scatti e placcaggi più fluidi e migliori. Tiki-taka.

⚽ GOL!
Festeggia ogni gol con la tua squadra e vivi la tensione durante i calci di rigore.

⚽ ESTETICA NUOVA, VIBRAZIONI CLASSICHE
Scopri nuove squadre, giocatori e stadi con la sua nuovissima estetica stile cartone animato e non perderti più nulla sul campo grazie alle nuove angolazioni della telecamera. Qualcuno ha un aspetto familiare?

70010000040683.name: Felix The Toy
70010000040683.intro: A small toy with a big heart!
70010000040683.description:
Help Felix find his owner after a mysterious event causes every human on the planet to vanish into thin air.

- 7 large themed levels
- Story mode that follows Felix on his journey!
- Authentic retro feel without pandering
- Collect coins and keys!
- Credits screen to see those responsible for the magic!
- a full story, nice music

Gameplay Tips : Lower the camera or rotate it to avoid clipping in high up areas/general areas.

70010000040688.name: Swords & Souls: Neverseen
70010000040688.intro: Swords & Souls: Neverseen è un RPG unico in cui si può avanzare solo con una certa dose di abilità!
70010000040688.description:
From SoulGame Studio, creators of the wildly popular Swords & Souls, comes an all new, even bigger standalone adventure to an island far across the sea. In Swords & Souls: Neverseen you find yourself shipwrecked and caught up in a struggle between a dangerous witch and some decidedly kooky townsfolk. To stop the witch, you'll need to train, fight, train, and fight some more in this addictive single-player combat-focused game that rewards player skill and juicy progression.

- Addictive and evolving training minigames to train your character's stats	
- A fast-paced blend of real-time and turn-based combat 
- Face hordes of enemies across the Neverseen and its wild environments
- Tame pets and meet colourful mercenaries, both to fight beside you
- Vary your playstyle with six types of weapons, passive skills, and unique rings
- Upgrade your home and training grounds for stat and experience gain
- Buy equipment, invest in the local museum, go shopping, fishing and more!
- Keep playing in the post-game endless mode with randomized encounters
- Online leaderboard to share your high scores 
- A light-hearted story filled with surprises and humour

70010000040690.name: Wood Block Escape Puzzles
70010000040690.intro: Challenging unblocking puzzles with different difficulties ranging from beginner to expert.
70010000040690.description:
Tease your brain in this challenging puzzle game where the player must move the red block all the way to the right side of the game board. However, other blocks obstruct the way which must be moved out of the way to unblock the red one. Unlock new difficulties by earning stars and reach the expert difficulty. 

Wood block escape puzzles a fun and simple way to relax and challenge your logical reasining and concentration.

70010000040695.name: Banners of Ruin
70010000040695.intro: Build a deck and fight a series of turn-based combats with up to 6 party characters through the city of Dawn's Point.
70010000040695.description:
The Blackfoots have been dealt a mighty blow by the fearsome House Ender - you must infiltrate their defences and cut out the rot.

Build your deck and fight your way through the city of Dawn's Point with card based combat and up to 6 members in your party. Characters loyal to your cause have a set of unique cards and abilities that may augment your deck in powerful, exciting ways. Defeat each of the elite opponents in your path to the city's Guard Captain and cripple the Enders at their core. You and your brethren may fall at this attempt, but there will always be others to carry the torch. House Blackfoot will remember, and they will never relent. Encounter a series of scenarios as you travel through the city which may help you, but at the expense of some moral ground.

70010000040700.name: Dodgeball Academia
70010000040700.intro: Allenati con Otto, uno studente principiante di dodgeball, e un eclettico gruppo di personaggi in Dodgeball Academia per dominare ogni campo di questo gioco di sport RPG.
70010000040700.description:
In un mondo dove il dodgeball è tutto, ti unisci a Otto all'accademia e ti alleni per diventare il campione di dodgeball definitivo. In otto episodi, ti farai degli amici e dei rivali con l'unico scopo di creare il team di dodgeball più forte di tutti. 

Fai salire Otto di livello e sviluppa un team dinamico in un vasto e personalizzabile sistema di progressione del party. Nel frattempo, esplora l'ampia Dodgeball Academia e scopri le verità da tempo nascoste tra le mura in cui vivi, studi e domini.

Caratteristiche chiave: 

- Esplora e scopri i segreti della Dodgeball Academia nel suo vasto e variegato campus pieno di vita
- Attraversa una modalità storia RPG con tanto di episodi, missioni principali, missioni secondarie e minigiochi della scuola
- Sblocca e potenzia personaggi unici, diversificando il tuo team di dodgeball attraverso una progressione del personaggio e del party in stile RPG 
- Gioca in incontri di dodgeball pieni di azione con uno stile picchiaduro unico e affronta temibili nemici e boss
- Combatti contro un amico in una modalità competitiva locale

70010000040729.name: Arcade Archives SHINGEN SAMURAI-FIGHTER
70010000040729.intro: It's battle time in this gory, historical action game!
70010000040729.description:
"SHINGEN SAMURAI-FIGHTER" is an action game released by JALECO in 1988.
The player controls Takeda Shingen, embarking on a grand journey to defeat Uesugi Kenshin.
Pick up the 風（FU), 林(RIN), 火(KA), 山(ZAN), and other items that power you up as you defeat enemy warlords.　

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

*This game uses the Japanese ROM for the main part of the game.
The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.

70010000040734.name: Wood Block Escape Puzzles 2
70010000040734.intro: Challenging unblocking puzzles with different difficulties ranging from beginner to expert.
70010000040734.description: Wood block escape puzzles a fun and simple way to relax and challenge your logical reasining and concentration.

70010000040751.name: Unavowed
70010000040751.intro: Join the ranks of the Unavowed, and fight against the oncoming darkness.
70010000040751.description:
A demon possessed you one year ago. Since that day, you unwillingly tore a trail of bloodshed through New York City. Waking up on a stormy rooftop, you meet your saviors: the Unavowed, an ancient society dedicated to stopping evil. Life as you knew it is over, but by joining them you have a chance to reverse some of the damage you’ve done—and, if you choose wisely, to redeem yourself.

Shape your hero: Name the playable character, choose their gender, and pick from three origin stories to customize the protagonist.

Choose your party: Select two out of four companions to join you on missions across the boroughs of New York City. Each member of the Unavowed has a unique personality and skillset, providing different solutions to the obstacles you’ll encounter. 

Follow your conscience: Difficult choices await. In Unavowed’s subtly branching storyline, your decisions could come back to help you… or haunt you.

Play how you want: Controls refined for Nintendo Switch™ allow you to play comfortably with either the Joy-Con™ controllers or the touch screen.

“Unavowed is much more than it appears: it's a brilliantly written adventure that makes you care deeply about its inhabitants and subverts your expectations.” Gamespot, 9/10

“With a great cast of characters, Unavowed is a stylish urban supernatural fantasy that is touching, funny, endearing, replayable and above all, fun.” Adventure Gamers, 5 stars

“An adventure game of the highest calibre, with a story that'll grip you from beginning to end.” GamesMaster UK, 90%

“This game is definitely a fusion of different themes and cultures you see in fantasy stories of all kinds—we have Jinn, fire mages, elementals, mer folk, dragons, dryads, fae, and ghosts. You’d think squashing this many ingredients into a blender would just result in something confused and muddled, but it works REALLY WELL, I am impressed.” Pushing Up Roses (YouTube)

70010000040753.name: Snake It 'Til You Make It
70010000040753.description:
Slide, slither and snake your way to victory! Shed the skin of previous puzzle games and worm your way through hours of fun!

Obstacle Courses - Serpentine pathways lay before you, writhe your way through deadly traps and complex puzzles. The fangs of defeat chase at your tail but will they catch you?

Battle Royale - A multiplayer snake pit, compete with your friends and find out which venomous reptile comes out on top!

Apple Grab - Adam and Eve would be furious! Grab as many apples as you can with up to 4 player co-operative fun. Eat all the apples and score high! Leave the orchard empty!

Marathon Battle - You can play this game solo or with a partner. Fight the other Snakes in the den, This pit has only one champion! Score high for big rewards, unlocking greater challenges. Don't let the easy levels constrict you!

70010000040758.name: Donuts'n'Justice
70010000040758.intro: Servi la giustizia di strada con carattere... e ciambelle!
70010000040758.description:
I nostri poliziotti sono due antieroi simpatici e tosti che odiano i criminali. Insieme, sparano per fare la differenza nella comunità.

Spara munizioni o lancia granate contro i malviventi e abbatti i capi delle organizzazioni criminali che terrorizzano le strade.

Affronta più di 14 tipi di nemici, tra cui pericolose bande di motociclisti e alieni, lotta con minacciosi boss e partecipa ad avvincenti inseguimenti in auto. 

Caratteristiche
* Comandi semplici e azione in stile arcade
* Grafica pixel art creata con passione
* Co-op locale a 2 giocatori
* Stile da classico poliziesco anni '80

70010000040760.name: Gutwhale
70010000040760.description:
Gutwhale è un'avventura roguelike che si svolge nel ventre di una bestia! Per padroneggiare le sfide di questo gioco dovrai gestire lo spazio che ti separa dalle munizioni, mentre ti fai strada attraverso un sistema digestivo!

Scendi nel profondo dello stomaco, tieni le munizioni a portata di mano, sblocca strani cappelli e fatti schiacciare da un furgone! I livelli vengono generati in modo casuale e la modalità sfida finale può essere giocata all'infinito!

Caratteristiche
* 3 aree con nemici unici
* Diversi cappelli da sbloccare
* Completare il gioco è solo l'inizio della fine
* Modalità punteggio record infinita

70010000040761.name: Rabisco+
70010000040761.intro: Un gioco action grazioso ma complesso!
70010000040761.description:
La luna è triste perché ha perduto le sue stelle, e ora il cielo è vuoto e buio.

Aiuta la Signora Rabisco a recuperare le stelle perdute e riportare la luce in questo mondo grazioso ma pieno di pericoli. Immergiti in un adorabile stile grafico ispirato ai disegni a pastello, tra colori sgargianti e linee disegnate a mano. La colonna sonora Bossa Nova contrappunta lo stile estetico per creare un'atmosfera rilassante.

Rabisco offre una difficoltà elevata con più di 20 tipi di nemici, numerosi oggetti interattivi e persino una modalità Speed run.

Caratteristiche
* Gameplay con movimento in 2D
* Grafica e musica graziose e rilassanti
* 100 livelli
* Modalità Speed run

70010000040763.name: Klondike Solitaire Collection
70010000040763.description:
Do you love Klondike (also known as "Classic Solitaire" or "Patience"), but want a bigger challenge?
Now you can play Klondike and other popular variants with different levels of difficulty.

The collection contains 10 different games
• Agnes Bernauer
• Batsford
• Blind Alleys
• Giant
• King Albert
• Klondike
• Lady Jane
• Pas Seul
• Thumb and Pouch
• Westcliff

Features:
• Unlimited undo
• Auto complete
• Statistics
• Rules for each game

70010000040793.name: HORROR TALES: The Wine
70010000040793.intro: Explore a post-pandemic fictional Mediterranean island and confront your Nemesis!
70010000040793.description:
Mediterranean Horror: Explore the forsaken capital of an awe-inspiring archipelago. Do not let yourself be fooled by the gentle sea breeze, the Mediterranean vistas or the comforting summer sun. Since the Devil's Fevers pandemic ravaged the city, it was abandoned, and now only horrific nightmares await there.

Survive your Nemesis: Someone is relentlessly hunting you. Suffer and agonize while you try to run away from the encounters with this strange stalker obsessed with you.

Intense Challenges: Solve environmental riddles, physics puzzles and other similar challenges in an interconnected vertical world. Even while being chased and hunted.

Accessibility and Photomode: Tweak more than 20 Accessibility settings to create a tailored experience for you. Use the Photomode to make perfect shots and unlock many secrets using it.

70010000040825.name: Turbo Skiddy Racing
70010000040825.description:
Gareggia contro un massimo di 4 auto, guidate dall'IA o da giocatori locali, su 14 piste; come pilota esperto, dovrai gestire la guida della tua auto su paraurti e salti, strade in curva e persino ghiaccio.

Non farti sorpassare dalle veloci auto guidate dal dispositivo o dalle auto degli altri giocatori, evita le collisioni e vinci ogni gara.
 
Il gioco è costruito sul miglior motore fisico per veicoli disponibile per sensazioni di guida reale e un sistema di intelligenza artificiale per auto guidate dal computer molto efficace.

È dotato di grafica 3D ad alta definizione, insieme a musiche rock e suoni realistici, nonché effetti visivi mozzafiato.

Se vi piacciono i giochi di auto, questo è diverso, questo è per voi!

Caratteristiche principali:
- 6 scenari
- 14 Tracce
- 12 auto da scegliere
- Fino a 4 veicoli simultanei
- Multiplayer locale: Fino a 4 giocatori locali
- Ambiente sonoro realistico
- Effetti visivi: Nebbia, Super Skidmarks, Gas di scarico...

70010000040829.name: Undead Battle Royale
70010000040829.intro: Stermina gli zombie e raggiungi il massimo punteggio in un gioco di sopravvivenza in cooperazione/competizione con più giocatori!
70010000040829.description:
Un vasto arsenale di armi e la sete per il sangue degli zombie sono tutto ciò che si frappone tra te e una morte raccapricciante nell’azione di prendi-e-gioca della Battaglia Reale dei Morti Viventi!
I morti viventi si sono levati. La civiltà è scomparsa. Ora solo una persona può portare l’umanità indietro dall’orlo dell’abisso: tu! Sopravvivi all’offensiva, fai strage dei tuoi nemici e afferra la vittoria!

[Modalità solo]
Rimanda i tuoi nemici nella tomba con ogni genere di armi e veicoli!
Pensi di essere al sicuro all’interno? Farai meglio a ripensarci!
Guardati dagli elicotteri che attaccano dall’aria!
Completa le missioni e ottieni il punteggio massimo!

[Modalità multi]
Giocabile con 2-4 giocatori!
Lavorate insieme per sterminare i morti viventi nemici!
Uccidi zombie giganti per guadagnare bonus giganti!
Competi con i tuoi amici per il punteggio più alto!
Combatti altri giocatori per scoprire chi è davvero il migliore!
Multi-giocatore locale
Giocabile con 2-4 giocatori!
Connettiti a una rete condivisa e combatti online!
Porta le tue consolle commutabili e competi per il punteggio più alto!
Tutti i punteggi non sono visibili dagli altri giocatori, garantendo che la competizione sia feroce fino all’ultimo secondo!

70010000040839.name: Kirakira stars idol project Ai
70010000040839.intro:
"I want to be an idol!"
The story of a producer and an idol's growth begins in a small entertainment company.
70010000040839.description:
What if your childhood friend grew up into a gorgeous young lady? What if she asked you to move in with her? What if the two of you joined forces to make her the hottest new pop idol sensation? Follow fledgling idol Ai and producer Nobu as they navigate the ups and downs of life, love, and the entertainment industry in this visual novel adventure!

-STORY-
The entertainment industry is a battlefield.
In recent years, countless pop idols have launched new careers, some achieving fame and fortune, others falling into obscurity. Competition is so fierce, people have started referring to this era as the "Warring Idols Period."
Down on his luck and forced to leave his employee dorm, young producer Nobuyuki Kinoshita runs into an old friend, Ai Amane. Little does he know that this chance reunion will have far-reaching consequences.
After inviting Nobuyuki to move in with her, and learning that his company is running low on talent, Ai makes a suprising declaration:
"I want to be an idol!"
Now, Ai is determined to help Nobu save ODA Productions from bankruptcy, and to transform her own life on the path to becoming an idol.

70010000040847.name: Heart Chain Kitty
70010000040847.intro: Help Kittey find his parents! They're lost in a dream, but dreaming is what young Kittey does best.
70010000040847.description:
A heart-shaped stranger has arrived on Kitty Island! And he brings news of his parents. Of course Kittey has to go on a journey to find them now. Deep below the world, Darkside awaits. And possibly a nightmare or two. But Kittey will be fine - he'll just have to find more of these mysterious hearts. Hearts are love, and love gives us strength.

Heart Chain Kitty is a 3d platformer with big and surreal levels. Kittey learns new abilities as he progresses through his adventure. Putting these to good use, he'll surely find his parents soon.

Features:

●A smooth and shiny voxel world
●A little chubby kitty as a protagonist
●Space hippos!
●Two secret bosses and optional levels & challenges
●Quests
●A robot mom!
●Little nerds (plural because there's more than one)
●Over 50 levels
●2.5d Levels - hidden 2d levels in a 3d platformer
●Two and a half endings (and one non-ending)
●A very big adventure

70010000040858.name: Rally Racer: Offroad Racing Car Game
70010000040858.intro: Drive ahead, Drift & Overdrive! Most extreme offroad racing game!
70010000040858.description:
Take an extreme RIDE on the WILD side with Rally Racer 4x4: Offroad Racing Car Game!
Forget about driving on asphalt! Sand, dirt, sharp turns, cliffs and the heavy roar of the engines – this is what will test your driving skills to the fullest. One of the best extreme rally car games; this is your chance to tap into dirt racing!
 
Sports car stuck in a pit of the track, and you must drive from the start? Why do you need a sports car when you have a huge 4x4 ready to DRIFT on the DIRT? Fly all the bumps and hills at rocket speed, like a pro. Shred the asphalt to the dirt! Become the next LEGEND! Become a real RALLY RACER!
 
AN EPIC RACING GAME
Jump to the game to DRIFT and RACE! Experience drift speed on the road and be the king of car racers!
Experience motorsport with the new rally simulator.
 
There is only one road to drive – NO ROAD!
